var COMPARE_COLOR="red";var SORTED_COLOR="green";var SWAP_COLOR="yellow";var PREVIOUS_COLOR="#0074D9";var NEW_COLOR="#00d999";var COMPARE_CASE=1,SWAP_CASE=2,ALREDY_SORTED_CASE=3,NEW_SORTED_COLOR_CASE=4,PREVIOUS_COLOR_CASE=5;module.exports=function driver(arr,algorithm,speed,size,enableButton){var SPEED=Math.pow(speed,2)/size;var barArr=document.getElementsByClassName("array-bars");var Arr=algorithm(arr);var _loop=function _loop(){var obj=Arr[i];switch(obj.case){case COMPARE_CASE:setTimeout(function(){var startIdx=obj.start;var endIdx=obj.end;var barOneStyle=barArr[startIdx].style;var barTwoStyle=barArr[endIdx].style;barOneStyle.backgroundColor=COMPARE_COLOR;barTwoStyle.backgroundColor=COMPARE_COLOR;},i*SPEED);break;case SWAP_CASE:setTimeout(function(){var startIdx=obj.start;var endIdx=obj.end;var barOneStyle=barArr[startIdx].style;var barTwoStyle=barArr[endIdx].style;barOneStyle.backgroundColor=SWAP_COLOR;barTwoStyle.backgroundColor=SWAP_COLOR;barOneStyle.height=obj.barOneHeight;barTwoStyle.height=obj.barTwoHeight;barArr[startIdx].innerText=obj.barOneHeight.substr(0,obj.barOneHeight.length-2);;barArr[endIdx].innerText=obj.barTwoHeight.substr(0,obj.barTwoHeight.length-2);},i*SPEED);break;case ALREDY_SORTED_CASE:setTimeout(function(){var startIdx=obj.start;var endIdx=obj.end;var barOneStyle=barArr[startIdx].style;var barTwoStyle=barArr[endIdx].style;barOneStyle.backgroundColor=SORTED_COLOR;barTwoStyle.backgroundColor=SORTED_COLOR;},i*SPEED);break;case NEW_SORTED_COLOR_CASE:setTimeout(function(){var startIdx=obj.start;var barOneStyle=barArr[startIdx].style;barOneStyle.backgroundColor=NEW_COLOR;},i*SPEED);break;case PREVIOUS_COLOR_CASE:setTimeout(function(){var startIdx=obj.start;var endIdx=obj.end;var barOneStyle=barArr[startIdx].style;var barTwoStyle=barArr[endIdx].style;barOneStyle.backgroundColor=PREVIOUS_COLOR;barTwoStyle.backgroundColor=PREVIOUS_COLOR;},i*SPEED);break;default:console.log("Something weng wrong!");}};for(var i=0;i<Arr.length;i++){_loop();}// setTimeout(()=>{enableButton()},Arr.length*SPEED);
};
